channel.title: Structured Concurrency on Coding life
channel.description: Recent content in Structured Concurrency on Coding life

item.title: The Beauty of Swift Language â€” Structured Concurrency
item.description: Modern CPUs usually have multiple cores and some computers even have more than one CPUs, which means they can run multiple instructions in parallel. In order to utilise this hardware feature, we need to structure our code in such way that it can run concurrently. Structured concurrency that exists in many modern languages is invented just for this purpose.
